title: EventResponse
description: The response that contains the event identifier.

eventId.description: The unique identifier for the asynchronous event.

mdmInfo.description:
The current information for the provided token.
The response only includes this field when MDM sets a value using the [Client Config](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/devicemanagement/client-config-4szk1) endpoint.

tokenExpirationDate.description:
The token expiration date in an ISO-8601 format.
Note: The server shows all dates and times in UTC.

uId.description: The unique library identifier. When querying records using multiple tokens that may share libraries, use the `uId` field to filter duplicates and avoid double-counting records when different content managers upload duplicate tokens.
